subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Doping
Gymnastics
lead_paragraph: Gymnast Morgan Hamm was given a public warning Thursday by the United States Anti-Doping Agency for using anti-inflammatory medication without receiving clearance to use that banned drug.
snippet: Gymnast Morgan Hamm was given a public warning Thursday by the United States Anti-Doping Agency for using anti-inflammatory medication without receiving clearance to use that banned drug.
